dict.string: Move the mouse cursor to prevent sleeping

query=$1
echo -n $query#!/bin/zsh
WIGGLE_SCRIPT="$HOME/.alfred_mouse_wiggle.sh" COMMAND="$1"
# Auto-install cliclick if not found if ! command -v cliclick >/dev/null 2>&1; then # Use brew to install if available if command -v brew >/dev/null 2>&1; then osascript -e 'display notification "Installing cliclick..." with title "Mouse Wiggle"' brew install cliclick else osascript -e 'display notification "Homebrew not found. Please install cliclick manually." with title "Mouse Wiggle Error"' exit 1 fi fi
if [[ "$COMMAND" == "start" ]]; then cat > "$WIGGLE_SCRIPT" <<'EOF' #!/bin/zsh while true; do cliclick m:+5,+0 sleep 0.5 cliclick m:+0,+5 sleep 0.5 cliclick m:-5,+0 sleep 0.5 cliclick m:+0,-5 sleep 0.5 done EOF
chmod +x "$WIGGLE_SCRIPT" nohup "$WIGGLE_SCRIPT" > /dev/null 2>&1 & elif [[ "$COMMAND" == "stop" ]]; then pkill -f .alfred_mouse_wiggle.sh rm -f "$WIGGLE_SCRIPT" fi
